name: Arboritec™ Genuine Naked 2-component Ceramic Fortified Waterborne Lacquer
description: Arboritec™ Genuine Naked 2-component Ceramic Fortified Waterborne Lacquer is a full- matt waterborne 100% PU finish for wood and parquet floors in heavy traffic areas. Unique composition of its raw materials allows it to be called as „bio- based“ product. As by Arboritec core standard, product is fortified with ceramics based on our unique Small Particles Technology. Genuine Naked is exceptionally durable to scratches, heel marks and ordinary household chemicals. Genuine Naked is „invisible“ after application which corresponds to markets desire for natural look of finished floors. Added ceramic particles make Genuine Naked even more environmentally friendly and low VOC. Groundbraking purity of product and its composition allows its usage as „invisible“ top coat of Arboritec Miracle Oil. Latter provides opportunity to combine colored oil enhanced look combined with „invisible“ protection of surface.
